titles.title: A concurrent resolution concerning the approximately 190 children and youths at the Romanian Institution for the Unsalvageables at Sighetu Marmatei who are in desperate need of humanitarian assistance.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4433)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Calls upon: (1) the Government of Romania to allow the approximately 190 children and youths at the Romanian Institution for the Unsalvageables at Sighetu Marmatiei to come to the United States for humanitarian assistance, including proper medical attention and treatment; and (2) the Secretary of State to grant these persons expedited entry into the United States.
